name: Privacy Shield
description: Secure document redaction tool for sensitive client data. Automatically identifies and masks PAN, Aadhaar, and other confidential information in PDFs.

name: File Saathi
description: Offline PDF manipulation tool for merge, split, protect, unlock, and audit-safe document handling. All processing happens locally on your machine.

name: 26AS Analyzer
description: Reads and analyzes .txt 26AS files downloaded from TRACES. Generates clean, structured reports for TDS reconciliation and tax credit verification.

name: LeaseWizard
description: Professional lease calculator for CAs and finance teams. Compute Lease Liability & ROU Asset values as per Ind AS 116 with detailed amortisation schedules and Excel/PDF export. Works 100% offline.
